Question: PLCOSKIN Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PLCOSKIN Co.,Ltd.

CES 2024 Innovation Award Product - TissueDerm (Pink Reborn)

- Artificial skin combining PCL mesh and collagen sheets for tissue reinforcement and reconstruction
- Collagen sheet promotes tissue regeneration and fixes silicone implants
- Biodegradable PCL solves tissue adhesion problems
- Developed in collaboration with Vitalab, Italy
- 7 skincare products under YOULIEF range
- Long-lasting effects and free of allergens and microplastics
- Products include moisture cream, eye care cream, night cream, sun cream, ampoule, moisturizing pump, toner, and foam cleanser
- YOULIEF products use ingredients extracted from flowers
- Dedicated to regenerative medicine technology and improving human life
Summary_cn:
PLCOSKIN有限公司。

CES 2024创新奖产品 - TissueDerm（粉色再生）

- 通过PCL网格和胶原蛋白片材将人工皮肤与组织加固和重建相结合
- 胶原蛋白片促进组织再生并固定硅胶植入物
- 可生物降解的PCL解决了组织粘连问题
- 与意大利维塔实验室合作开发
- YOULIEF系列下有7种护肤产品
- 持久效果并且不含过敏原和微塑料
- 产品包括保湿霜、眼霜、晚霜、防晒霜、安瓿、保湿泵、爽肤水和泡沫洗面奶
- YOULIEF产品采用从花中提取的成分
- 致力于再生医学技术和改善人类生活
